text:
="preserve">Luciano Ricceri (26 April 1940 – 1 February 2020) was an Italian production designer and costume designer. He was the winner of the David di Donatello for Best Sets and Decorations for the 1991 movie "Captain Fracassa's Journey" and the 2001 movie "Unfair Competition". He was born in Rome.
Ricceri died in Orte on 1 February 2020, at the age of 79.
